title: 2BD/1BA apartment in Ohio City - $1,300/mo
posting_body: The apartment is available for immediate move-in.
I am available for showings during most evenings and weekends, but I could be available in some mornings and afternoons.
The unit was completely renovated at the end of 2016 and is still in great condition.
The apartment is in walking distance to the West Side Market, Planet Fitness, and all of Ohio City's bars and restaurants.
The building is very close to an RTA stop and within walking distance of the rapid station.
Street parking is available along Lorain Avenue and W. 38th Street.
There's usually off-street parking available on the corner parking lot @
The entire unit was gutted and renovated with new appliances, cabinets, granite countertops, refinished hardwood flooring, new heating system, all new ceiling fans, new electrical and new windows.
The apartment has central heat and air.
Washer and Dryer machines are provided in the basement.
Please contact me to arrange a walkthrough.
All screening and payments will be done through <URL>.
I am only interested in 12-month leases at this time.
I will consider small pets, and reserve the right to charge a pet fee depending on the type of pet.
I am happy to answer any questions that you may have.
